description: Developing open-source tools for the student community. Currently contributing to the core website (SvelteKit), the UNI mobile app (Flutter), and a scheduler builder for UP students (React).
Part-time role working on retail software solutions for major clients like SONAE. Engineered robust PHP microservices for backend operations and maintained Android systems for in-store deployments.

Full-time summer internship continuing development on [[Dodia.pt|https://dodia.pt|/work/dodia]] and the agency's own website. Marked my first professional deep dive into Svelte, refining UI interactions and performance.

Curricular internship where I built [[Dodia.pt|https://dodia.pt|/work/dodia]] from the ground up. Architected the full-stack solution using Next.js and Drizzle ORM, delivering my first production-grade application.
